data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Farrukhabad to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Farrukhabad, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Farrukhabad to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Farrukhabad, Uttar Pradesh, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,864,463 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 20,737 believers in the county of Farrukhabad.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Gadaria (Hindu traditions) people.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Farrukhabad access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Farrukhabad, Uttar Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Farrukhabad to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Farrukhabad
location.people_groups_list: Karwal, Jat Deswal, Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions), Lakhera, Gadaria Nikhad
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Karwal (8,000), Jat Deswal (74,000), Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions) (1,800), Lakhera (189,000), Gadaria Nikhad (1,373,000)
